explanation: [0-0] Two young men are standing on a grassy area outdoors, with lush greenery, trees, and a white fence behind them. There is a grayish-white chair on the grass. One shirtless man stands in front of the chair, and another with dyed white hair stands behind it. He is wearing a white T-shirt, holding an orange balloon in his left hand and a knife in his right hand.

[0-3] The shirtless man sits down on the chair with his hands on his thighs. The man in the white T-shirt lifts the balloon above his head and playfully cuts it with the knife. The outer orange balloon bursts instantly, startling the shirtless man, his mouth agape. After the orange balloon bursts, a purple balloon inside is revealed. The shirtless man looks up, closes his eyes, and clasps his hands together in front of his chest.

[3-8] Then, a man wearing a gray T-shirt, black pants, a gray baseball cap, and glasses walks in from the right and sits down on the chair. The man behind the chair lifts the purple balloon above his head and then cuts it with the knife, laughing. The man in the gray T-shirt squeezes his eyes shut and clamps his mouth tight. The man in the white T-shirt carefully makes a few more cuts on the balloon, and the purple balloon bursts, revealing a dark blue balloon inside. The man in the gray T-shirt is ultimately unharmed.
